features.title: Secure
features.explain: Loopring is an open-sourced, audited,  and non-custodial DEX protocol, which means nobody in the Loopring ecosystem needs to trust others. Your cryptoassets are always under your own control.

features.title: High Throughput
features.explain: Loopring powers highly scalable decentralized exchanges by batch-processing thousands of requests off-chain. The performance of underlying blockchain is no longer the bottleneck.

features.title: Low Cost
features.explain: Loopring performs most operations, including order-matching and trade settlement, off the Ethereum blockchain. Such design dramatically reduces the overall trading cost.
